Title: The impact of phase conjugation on the nonlinear-Shannon limit: The difference between optical and electrical phase conjugation
Source: IEEE Summer Top. Meet. Ser., SUM
Abstract: © 2015 IEEE.We show that optical and electrical phase conjugation enable effective nonlinear compensation, The impact of polarization mode dispersion and finite processing bandwidth on the ultimate limits are also considered.
